name: For Old Time's Sake
description:
This game was created as part of the Brackeys Game Jam n°4! 

This is my first ever Unity project, and first C# code that runs (somewhat) well.

I hope you can find some enjoyment, and please feel free to comment on anything, after all I need to know where I can improve (probably many things).

For those who are wondering, yes, many scripts and a large portion of this project was made using tutorials, namely Brackeys!

I created player and enemy sprites, as well as missiles and UI controls, but the tiles and world is from the "Sunnyland"asset pack, available on Unity Store.

The game is not finished, and pretty much falls upon 25% of my initial idea, if not less. I really hoped to get more done, but I guess for a first time this isn't too bad! I'll definitely keep working on game development!

Anyways, thanks for playing my game!
